# preferredMaximumResolutionForExpensiveNetworks

**Instance Property**

An upper limit on the resolution of video to download when connecting over expensive networks.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var preferredMaximumResolutionForExpensiveNetworks: CGSize { get set }
```

## Configuring expensive network behavior

- **preferredPeakBitRateForExpensiveNetworks**: A limit of network bandwidth consumption by the item when connecting over expensive networks.
